channel.title: Run.bat
channel.description:
Well after installing JDK 17,and JRE 17, I tried to run my server and client but all they do is pop up for a second,then go away...
Here's what it says: [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.Press any key to continue...[/code]
